description: Computes correlation coefficients between sub-brick pairs

input_datasets.title: Input Datasets
input_datasets.description: List of input datasets to be used (e.g. img1+orig, img2+orig)

mask.title: Mask Dataset
mask.description: Dataset to be used as a mask; only voxels with nonzero values will be averaged

mrange.title: Mask Range
mrange.description: Restrict mask values to those between a and b (inclusive) for masking purposes

demean.title: Demean Flag
demean.description: Remove the mean from each volume prior to computing the correlation

docoef.title: Least Square Fit Coefficient Flag
docoef.description: Return the least square fit coefficients {a,b}

dosums.title: Statistics Summary Flag
dosums.description: Return xbar, ybar, variance, covariance, and correlation coefficient

dodice.title: Dice Coefficient Flag
dodice.description: Return the Dice coefficient (the Sorensen-Dice index)

show_labels.title: Show Labels Flag
show_labels.description: Print sub-brick labels to help identify what is being correlated

1D.title: 1D Format Flag
1D.description: Add comment headings for the 1D format
